title: Day-11
details: How about using AI in the next tool. The only thing that bothers me is AI technlogy is being run by giant companies and I am not sure how much of user's privacy will be protected!

title: Cosine Similarity
details: In data analysis, cosine similarity is a measure of similarity between two non-zero vectors defined in an inner product space. Cosine similarity is the cosine of the angle between the vectors; that is, it is the dot product of the vectors divided by the product of their lengths.

title: Action
details: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?

title: Day-11
details:
How about a tracker that can open up all your files and folders which you had been using before shutting down you PC?
It might help.
Feature:
- keep the history of what was opened.
- On starting the pc the app should start as well (this might be a little difficult to achieve in MacOS)
- Give two options to open up the entire history before last shutdown or selected files/folders
